import {useFieldArray,useForm} from "react-hook-form" export const DynamicFields=({handlePop,id})=>{ const{register,control,formState:{errors,isDirty},handleSubmit,watch}=useForm({ defaultValues:{education:[{emp_id:id}] ,mode: "onChange",} }) const{fields,append,remove}=useFieldArray({control,name:"education"}) const submitForm=(data)=>{ console.log(data.education) } return( <>
{ fields.map((item,i)=>{ return
{ watch(`education.${i}.course`)==="Graduation" && }
}) }
) }
